Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory122.png'}
{3: 'Babylonia Ground Frontier, Airforce Base 28, Battle Preparation Room'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The "Great Retreat"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It surely isn't looking good...", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Looks like I won't be alone this time."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '(Since when was he here?!)', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Relax. I was also urgently summoned here like you.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Looks like you've met each other."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Better not be talking behind my back, hahaha.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Babylonia Task Force, Aircraft-type Armor, ID BPO-29, Watanabe, reporting for duty.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: '25th Eastern Unit, 633th Tactical Airforce, Captain of the 3rd squadron. "Beak" Cyril.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You\'re the "Beak of Islay"?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Never thought a young man like you would recognize me.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Anyway, thanks, guys. You are our ace pilots of this retreat mission, code name Arcadia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Captain Cyril, you have my utmost respect. It is almost impossible to pilot "Fenrir" with a human body... Yet you have done it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "...Though it's a gamble of life every time you fly, I guess.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: "Getting modifications may be a more difficult task for me. I've lived long enough. Not a bad thing if I spend my final moments in the sky.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Captain, you are too humble. You and Watanabe are our best candidates for this operation in both strength and experience.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "...BPO-29, I've heard of you. Our new rising star. Eliminated 7 enemy aircraft single-handedly in the exercise. Impressive.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You flatter me.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Alright, back to the point. I have an emergency mission for the both of you.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'You must be familiar with Operation "Arcadia", the evacuation of maintenance facilities and supplies from the ground to Babylonia.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "That's right.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'After 5 full-scale transportation attempts, the greatest ever retreat in human history has finally come to an end.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'This is the final escort mission of the retreat. We decided to send a 2-aircraft team to safeguard the trip.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'This mission means a lot to the survival of humanity. Babylonia decided to assign the mission to the both of you. Make sure all supplies safely arrive at Babylonia.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Your mission starts at 13:45 today. The last transport shuttle of Operation Arcadia, "Halcyon 2", will take off from the ground at 14:00.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'At 11: 05, the other squads will sweep the area near the launch site and eliminate all enemy targets as planned.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Watanabe, Cyril.', 4: '2'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'The codename of this operation is "Tetrarch". Watanabe will be the lead; Cyril will be the wingman. You will form the escort squad of the 6th and final evacuation of Arcadia. Your codename is Dagger.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Before the shuttle successfully connects to Babylonia, the torch of humanity is in your hands.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Alright. The remaining time is all yours.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Get prepared.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I can't believe your dad is the Beak of Islay!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bruce', 3: 'Enough. You said it like three times already.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Hmph, you really don't know how good you got it. If my father was such a famous officer, I'd be on cloud nine.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory122.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Captain Cyril...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Are you... Bruce's...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: 'How do you know... the name of my...', 4: '1'}
